{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"5","subject":"Quality Assurance - Comprehensive testing and validation","description":"Phase 5: Final QA & Validation

**Objective**: Validate entire compute layer meets quality and security standards.

**Tasks**:
1. Run full test suite (unit + integration + chaos tests)
2. Verify Section 4 Razor compliance across all new code
3. Check forbidden modules/dependencies absent
4. Validate security boundaries (sandboxing, resource limits)
5. Performance benchmarking against baseline
6. Documentation review and API completeness
7. Prepare substantiation artifacts for META_LEDGER

**Dependencies**: Task 4 (Chaos Engineer)

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- All tests passing (113+ existing + new)
- Zero Section 4 violations
- No forbidden modules/dependencies
- Security audit complete
- Performance meets targets
- Ready for SUBSTANTIATE phase","assignedBy":"qa-validator","timestamp":"2026-02-18T20:58:19.691Z"}
